title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Critically lauded with an 8.6 IMDb rating from over 26K votes and an 87 Metacritic score, created by 'Breaking Bad's Vince Gilligan for Apple TV.

title: The Beast in Me
overview: A famous author is pulled into a twisted mind game with her rich, powerful new neighbor â€” who might be a murderer.
reason: A compelling Netflix mystery with a 7.5 IMDb rating from over 21K votes, starring Emmy winners Claire Danes and Matthew Rhys.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: Highly acclaimed with an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45K votes, backed by HBO, and starring Mark Ruffalo from the creator of 'Mare of Easttown'.

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: A popular Netflix drama with a 7.4 IMDb rating from over 35K votes, featuring well-known actors Jason Bateman and Jude Law.
